title: Jayce is so bae rn
body:
When you have won 4 games with him since starting to use the worlds build one shotting everyone i see come and vs me. 
Is this too op or is this now considered balanced cause he was out of meta for so long?

replies.body:
Played first non-aram game as Jayce last week (and it was ranked) 
Pretty much did the best in the whole game (must be op) 
his w with adc build almost gives draven dps
